question: Which committee has been constituted by the Union government to monitor the regional air connectivity scheme "UDAN"?
explanation: The Union government has recently constituted an inter-ministerial committee to monitor the regional air connectivity scheme UDAN (Ude Desh Ka Aam Naagrik) which seeks to make flying affordable by connecting un-served and under-served airports. Besides, the panel would be responsible for coordination among stakeholders, including state governments, for time bound implementation of the scheme. The committee will be chaired by Rajiv Nayan Choubey, the Civil Aviation Secretary. The committee will also be responsible for overall monitoring of the schemes of promotion of regional connectivity by way of revival of unserved and under-served airports.
